Description.Text:
Property Location
Nippon Hotel is in the heart of Istanbul, walking distance from Taksim Gezi Park and Taksim Square. This 4-star hotel is close to Topkapi Palace and Suleymaniye Mosque.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 171 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while DVD players and digital programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare. This Art Deco hotel also features gift shops/newsstands, a fireplace in the lobby, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in Istanbul? This hotel has 300 square feet (28 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare. This Art Deco hotel also features gift shops/newsstands, a fireplace in the lobby, and a television in the lobby.
Make yourself at home in one of the 171 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while DVD players and digital programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Nippon Hotel is in the heart of Istanbul, walking distance from Taksim Gezi Park and Taksim Square. This 4-star hotel is close to Topkapi Palace and Suleymaniye Mosque.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Taksim Gezi Park - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Taksim Square - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Taksim Republic Art Gallery - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Ataturk Cultural Center - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Istiklal Avenue - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Akbank Culture and Arts Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Istanbul Technical University - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Macka Park - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Cicek Pasaji - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Dogancay Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
BJK Inonu Stadium - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Nevizade Street - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Military Museum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Istanbul Military Museum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Istanbul Lutfi Kirdar Convention and Exhibition Centre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for Nippon Hotel is Istanbul (IST-Ataturk Intl.) - 15.5 km / 9.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Hotel will not hold and block any rooms as 'no name' or 'TBA', even from the allotment. Rates are not valid during congresses, meetings, incentive, exhibitions, Formula-1 grand prix and fairs. Early check-in is subject to availability. Late check-out is chargeable by all hotels in Turkey. Special requests are all subject to availability of the hotel on the day of check-in. Hotel does not provide complimentary arrival and departure airport transfers. Booking as 1 dbl/twin+1 extra bed+1 child is not possible in all room types. 1 twin + 1 extra bed is not possible, triple rooms are provided only as dbl+extra bed only. In one room with parents 0-5 years child is free up to one child only, the second 0-6 years child will be charged as 7-12 years. If the number of the guests is more than mentioned in the voucher then the hotel will charge guests directly for the difference.

Room 1
Check in time: 2pmCheck out time: 12pm
Notice
British nationals need a visa to enter Turkey, except for cruise ship passengers with ‘British Citizen’ passports who arrive at sea ports for tourist visits to the port city or nearby cities, provided that the visit doesn’t exceed 72 hours. Turkish visit visas are valid for multiple stays up to a maximum of 90 days in a 180 day period. We recommend that you get an e-Visa online through the official Republic of Turkey e-Visa website www.evisa.gov.tr . An e-visa currently costs $20 and you can pay by credit or debit card. If you use this option, you should apply at least 48 hours before travel and can do so up to 3 months in advance. In case of technical problems at the Turkish port of entry, carry a printed copy of your e-Visa or keep an electronic copy on a smartphone or other device to show at immigration. From October 29, 2018, self-service e-visa kiosks and Wi-Fi areas where visitors can apply for an e-Visa on arrival will no longer be available in Turkish airports; please note that visitors to Turkey will have to apply for e-visas in advance. Be wary of using unauthorised websites, as these may charge additional fees for supplying information and submitting applications. Some unauthorised websites have also issued fake e-Visas. If you have any queries regarding e-Visas call the Visa Contact Centre on +44 203 608 8090 (details provided by the Turkish Ministry of Foreign Affairs).
